text: Au gu gidee bolo nia daangada le e hai be digau gu mmaadagu, dela gaa hidi iei au, ga helekai gi digaula mo ang gi nadau dagi aamua, “Goodou hudee mmaadagu i tadau hagadaumee. Goodou gi langahia di hai o nia mahi a Tagi. Goodou heebagi i godou duaahina digau o Jew, godou dama, godou lodo, mo godou gowaa.”
